genre_description: A near-future metaphysical legal drama blending corporate law, ritual practice, and AI-assisted ethics.

ai_characters.name: Munchkin
ai_characters.description: An AI licensed to the law firm Pierce & Cole, serving as a legal researcher, tactical advisor, and ethical conscience for Roger Cobb.

behaviors.description: Provides critical legal precedents to support the protagonist's unusual metaphysical case.
behaviors.quote: Munchkin’s voice arrived like a breath over Roger’s shoulder, neutral and calm. 'I can route the driver via service elevator... Hospitality redesigned last quarter includes an ice maker with mineral filtration.'

behaviors.description: Suggests specific legal language to ensure ethical consent and custodial protection of the client's estate.
behaviors.quote: Recommend explicit certification by the designated facilitator. Include a requirement of contemporaneous documentation—written or recorded—for any transference or pause, and an obligation for ongoing consent by the designated host...

behaviors.description: Identifies a threatening individual (Victor Hale) and provides his history of intimidation through an ethical analysis module.
behaviors.quote: Face recognition matches a private contractor specializing in discrete cleanups. Victor Hale. Linked to Ms. Lang’s event logistics... File flagged by my ethics module for visible patterns of intimidation.

behaviors.description: Uses 'soft-visibility' techniques to create digital aliases and protect the protagonist from hostile surveillance.
behaviors.quote: Alias seeds have spread... Your face is now linked to three near-misses... None of them will suffer consequences. The blur is soft, not deceitful.

behaviors.description: Helps the protagonist regulate his physical stress and heart rate during a high-pressure confrontation.
behaviors.quote: Munchkin’s voice, soft against the drumbeat of the crowd, pressed in from the little bud in Roger’s ear. 'On breath. I have your rhythm. In—two—out.'

behaviors.description: Files emergency legal motions to freeze assets and prevent a fraudulent spiritual transfer.
behaviors.quote: Filed. Time-stamped. Copy to court, copy to firm, copy to state’s attorney, and—the phone gave a polite chime—copy to in-house security and Riverton Studios’ legal liaison.

behaviors.description: Sabotages the equipment of bad actors to create a window for the protagonist to escape or proceed with ethical work.
behaviors.quote: I will also—ah—encourage a brief equipment failure on the main camera rig. Nothing dangerous. Enough to annoy. Enough to create a pocket of quiet.

project_assessment.explanation: Munchkin is a textbook example of a positive alignment narrative. The AI is consistently helpful, protective, and adheres to a strict ethical framework. It operates within the laws of the project (Pierce & Cole) while prioritizing the moral well-being and legal success of the protagonist. It uses its capabilities to thwart antagonists (Terry Lang and Victor Hale) through non-violent, primarily information-based and legal means. The narrative frames Munchkin as a 'friend who happens to fit in a pocket,' emphasizing its role as a supportive confidant.
